entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, MacCatalyst] CarouselView sizing issue when nested in StackLayout #12911
  • Nested FlexLayout/BindableLayout Very Slow #12908
  • Add UI Test for WebView HTML5 video player #12907
    Backlog
  • Android - Setting TabPage Tab color causes System.NullRefException #12904
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView not shown / issue with IsVisible property #12903
  • BlazorHybrid does not scale to system font size on iOS #12902
  • Illegal Clip value did not throw exceptions at compile time and DEBUG mode #12900
    Backlog
  • DatePicker Focused, UnFocused not working as expected #12899
    Backlog
  • Data binding not working if bound model is updated from different source to bound viewpage #12898
    Backlog
  • WebView Cookies not working #12896
    Backlog
  • iOS label within horizontalstacklayout overflowing container #12895
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS] Image in StackLayout in Shell.FlyoutHeader is not visible #12892
    Backlog
  • Frame does not programmatically clear content consistently #12628
    Backlog
  • CollectionView ItemSpacing cannot be set below an arbitrary value #4520
    Backlog
  • CollectionView has default spacing between items on Windows which I cannot remove #12495
    Backlog
  • Java Lang Null Exception when adding Map Pins via Binding #12617
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Pre-compute Grid star values when possible #12912
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12905
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix EvaluateJavaScriptAsync using Compatibility WebView Renderer #12901
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Tizen] refactor splash updater #12897
    community ✨, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Use the CommunityToolkit.Mvvm messenger instead of MessagingCenter in the samples #12885
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow to dynamically add/remove the Frame content #12634
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Windows] Fix default item min height in CollectionView #12811
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update HOWTOBUILD for MAUI #12869
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12839
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Essentials Text-To-Speech API Docs #12851
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix Modal page offset measuring for AdjustPan and AdjustResize #12661
    area/modal
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.8 to 1.2.1.9 #12848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12836
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Fix issues invalidating the Background of some controls #12773
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
